Case studies

Selected examples across education and IT.

School Foundation – e-learning with Moodle

Education

Challenge: Needed remote teaching and centralized course content management.

Solution: Deployed Moodle in the client’s cloud with SSO, automated backups, and monitoring.

Results: 90% faster course launches, 99.95% availability.

MoodleSSO/KeycloakAutomated backupsSLA reporting

NordicTech – ticketing & support

IT consulting

Challenge: Fragmented channels and low visibility in support flows.

Solution: Introduced ticketing/helpdesk with SLAs, knowledge base, and dashboards.

Results: 45% shorter resolution time, 35% fewer re-opened tickets.

ZammadGLPIKnowledge baseDashboards
